channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-rc.7)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-rc.7)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.0-rc.7 - 2023-09-24 # Added # Support for NDMF integration #375 Removed # internal ApplyOnPlay framework #504 1.5.0-rc.6 - 2023-09-24 # Fixed # AvatarMask broken with many cases #502 1.5.0-rc.5 - 2023-09-23 # Added # Full EditMode Preview of RemoveMesh Components #500 Fixed # Remove unused bone references #498 MergeBone will loose some other transform information with extreamly small parent scale #499 1.
